Series.Actors: |Jonny Lee Miller|Lucy Liu|Aidan Quinn|John Noble|Jon Michael Hill|
Series.Overview: Following his fall from grace in London and a stint in rehab, eccentric Sherlock escapes to Manhattan where his wealthy father forces him to live with his worst nightmare – a sober companion, Dr. Watson. A successful surgeon until she lost a patient and her license three years ago, Watson views her current job as another opportunity to help people, as well as paying a penance. Holmes resumes his work as a police consultant in New York City and Watson has no choice but to accompany her irascible new charge on his jobs. But Sherlock finds her medical background helpful, and Watson realizes she has a knack for playing investigator. With the mischievous Sherlock Holmes now running free in New York solving crimes, it’s simple deduction that he’s going to need someone to keep him grounded, and it’s elementary that it’s a job for Watson.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dallas Roberts|Manny Perez|Jonathan Walker|Kristen Bush|
Episode.Overview: Detective Sherlock Holmes, along with his sober companion, Dr. Joan Watson, uses his uncanny ability to read people and analyze crimes to assist the NYPD on some of their more difficult cases. In the season premiere, Holmes consults on a home invasion that resulted in murder.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jennifer Ferrin|Bill Heck|Casey Siemaszko|Rosa Arredondo|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock uses his powers of deduction to consult on the murder of a young man who is shot upon entering his apartment. Meanwhile, Watson has dinner with her ex-boyfriend, Ty Morstan.

Episode.GuestStars: |Johnny Simmons|Yancey Arias|Michael Countryman|Erin Dilly|Selenis Leyva|Christopher Evan Welch|Larisa Polonsky|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock and Watson consult on a child abduction case involving a serial killer who is nicknamed "The Balloon Man," because he leaves a signature batch of balloons at each of his crime scenes.

Episode.GuestStars: |Craig Bierko|Molly Price|Luke Kirby|Jennifer Van Dyck|Andrew Pang|Susan Pourfar|
Episode.Overview: Even though he despises bankers, Holmes agrees to consult on a case involving the death of a Wall Street executive who appears to have overdosed on heroin. Meanwhile, with Holmes’ encouragement, Watson tries to re-enter the dating scene.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Harbour|David Costabile|Ben Rappaport|Jenni Barber|Anika Noni Rose|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock tries to determine who has been killing weak and terminal patients at a hospital, making it look like they died of natural causes. Meanwhile, Sherlock learns more about Joan’s decision to walk away from her surgical career.

Episode.GuestStars: |Reiko Aylesworth|Brian Kerwin|Roger Rees|Adam Lefevre|Matthew Humphreys|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock tries to prove that one of the people whose body was found in the wreckage of a small plane crash was actually killed before the plane went down. Meanwhile, Watson tries to convince Sherlock to meet with his elusive father.

Episode.GuestStars: |Callie Thorne|Keith Szarabajka|Stephen Kunken|Stephen Henderson|Brian Tarantina|Amy Hohn|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock assists with a double homicide that has the same M.O. as a series of murders that took place 13 years ago. Meanwhile, after being frozen out by Sherlock, Watson visits his old rehab center in order to learn more about the mysterious man in her care.

Episode.GuestStars: |Lisa Edelstein|John Pankow|Ato Essandoh|Donnie Keshawarz|Adam Mucci|Deepa Purohit|
Episode.Overview: While investigating an explosion that kills two people, Sherlock discovers a crime that’s been lying dormant for years. Meanwhile, Watson encourages Sherlock to finally pick a sponsor.

Episode.GuestStars: |Adam Rothenberg|Kristy Wu|Cameron Scoggins|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock uses his trademark deductive reasoning skills to find the killer of a college professor, Watson gets a call from a former lover who needs her help.

Episode.GuestStars: |Freda Foh Shen|Gbenga Akinnagbe|Reg Rogers|Steve Park|Sean Dugan|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock is called in to investigate when a supposedly uncrackable bank vault called “The Leviathan” is breached. Meanwhile, Joan is pleasantly surprised when Sherlock meets her family and defends her choice to become a sober companion.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jake Weber|Mark Moses|Melissa Farman|Leigh Ann Larkin|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock and Joan investigate the murder of the general manager of a high-end Manhattan hotel whose body is found inside an industrial laundry machine. Meanwhile, since Joan’s time with Sherlock is almost up, he offers her an apprenticeship.

Episode.GuestStars: |Vinnie Jones|Bobb'e J. Thompson|Marsha Stephanie Blake|Linda Emond|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock is reunited with "M." a British criminal who appears to have followed Sherlock to New York. Meanwhile, Joan has reservations about leaving Sherlock and taking on a new client.

Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Bekins|Michael Laurence|Chris Sullivan|Tawny Cypress|Kelly AuCoin|Linda Emond|
Episode.Overview: While on suspension from the NYPD, Sherlock investigates a suspicious hit-and-run accident involving a conspiracy theorist. Meanwhile, Watson tries to broker peace between Sherlock and Gregson.

Episode.GuestStars: |Terry Kinney|Kari Matchett|Jessica Hecht|David Wilson Barnes|Roger Robinson|Napiera Groves|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock pursues Martin Ennis, an unpredictable criminal, before he strikes again. During the investigation, Sherlock is forced to work alongside Kathryn Drummond, the FBI profiler who literally wrote the book on Ennis. Meanwhile, Watson faces eviction from her apartment.

Episode.EpisodeName: A Giant Gun, Filled with Drugs
Episode.GuestStars: |John Hannah|Michael Irby|Armand Schultz|
Episode.Overview: When Sherlock's ex-drug dealer, Rhys, comes around for help, Watson is concerned about Sherlock's sobriety after Rhys implies that Sherlock on drugs made a better detective.

Episode.GuestStars: |Malcolm Goodwin|Paula Garcés|Anwan Glover|Linda Emond|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock investigates what he believes will be an open-and-shut case after Detective Bell is attacked. However, the case takes an unexpected turn when the suspected assailant is found dead. Meanwhile, Sherlock encourages Joan to learn self-defense.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Furr|Christopher Sieber|Albert Jones|Jennifer Lim|Gibson Frazier|Dennis Boutsikaris|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock investigates a case involving a wealthy philanthropist who believes his incurable illness was given to him on purpose. Meanwhile, Sherlock tries to teach Joan his deductive skills by sending her to a suspicious dry cleaning establishment.

Episode.GuestStars: |Josh Hamilton|Jim True-Frost|Ato Essandoh|Geneva Carr|Andre Royo|Susan Pourfar|Roxanna Hope|
Episode.Overview: Joan investigates her first solo case when a wife disappears. The missing woman left behind a tear-filled video that mentions a murder on a subway platform. While Joan searches for the vanished lady, Sherlock probes the murder.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jill Flint|Becky Ann Baker|Frank Wood|Candis Cayne|Karl Miller|Bill Buell|Howard McGillin|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock and Joan try to prevent the largest cash vault in the U.S. from being robbed during a deadly blizzard. Meanwhile, Holmes attempts to help a transgender woman who is recovering from her latest breakup.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ato Essandoh|Thomas Jay Ryan|Wayne Duvall|Joseph Siravo|Tom Guiry|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock and Joan hunt for the accomplice of a murdered blackmailer who targeted families of rape victims. Meanwhile, Sherlock resists celebrating his first year of sobriety.

Episode.GuestStars: |Vinnie Jones|Roger Aaron Brown|Byron Jennings|F. Murray Abraham|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock resumes his hunt for Moriarty when Sebastian Moran reveals that a man who was thought to be dead from a heart attack was actually on the list of intended victims from Moriarty.

Episode.GuestStars: |Natalie Dormer|J.C. MacKenzie|Francie Swift|Stephanie Kurtzuba|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock agrees to take a case from a man claiming to be Moriarty, hoping it will bring him closer to finding his nemesis. Meanwhile, Gregson encourages Joan to give up the dangerous line of work she has chosen and go back to being a sober companion.

Episode.GuestStars: Natalie Dormer|Erik Jensen|Dominic Fumusa|John Bedford Lloyd|Michael Aronov|Austin Lysy|Lucas Caleb Rooney|Christopher McCann|Arnold Vosloo|Justine Cotsonas
Episode.Overview: As Sherlock reels at the reappearance of his former lover, Irene Adler, a series of flashbacks unravel the tumultuous events that led to his downfall into addiction. Sherlock and Joan once again find themselves in the crosshairs of the enigmatic Moriarty.

Episode.GuestStars: Natalie Dormer|Erik Jensen|Dominic Fumusa|John Bedford Lloyd|Michael Aronov|Austin Lysy|Lucas Caleb Rooney|Christopher McCann|Arnold Vosloo|Justine Cotsonas
Episode.Overview: As Sherlock reels at the reappearance of his former lover, Irene Adler, a series of flashbacks unravel the tumultuous events that led to his downfall into addiction. Sherlock and Joan once again find themselves in the crosshairs of the enigmatic Moriarty.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rhys Ifans|Sean Pertwee|Rufus Wright|Tim McMullan|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson travel to London to help track down an old mentor and investigate an unsolved mystery. Meanwhile, Mycroft Holmes, Sherlock's estranged brother, reunites with Sherlock and reveals some secrets of his own.

Episode.GuestStars: |Lynn Collins|Jeremy Jordan|Glenn Fitzgerald|Rich Sommer|Khalil Kain|Richard Holmes|
Episode.Overview: When a well-respected mathematician is found dead, Holmes and Watson set out to solve a murder and the purpose of the highly guarded equation he was trying to decipher. Meanwhile, Watson is conflicted when the son of a former patient approaches her for a loan.

Episode.GuestStars: |Christian Campbell|Ronald Guttman|Steve Kazee|Susan Pourfar|Laura Osnes|Peter McRobbie|
Episode.Overview: When Holmes and Watson set out to track down a civil contractor who leaked classified information, their lives are disrupted when they are targeted by the group of cyber-activists protecting him. Meanwhile, Joan takes the advice of a friend and signs up for an online dating service.

Episode.GuestStars: |Laura Benanti|Samuel H. Levine|Noelle Beck|Paul Fitzgerald|Patrick Kerr|Keesha Sharp|
Episode.Overview: When a financial consulting company CEO is poisoned to death, a woman from Sherlock's past emerges as a possible suspect.

Episode.GuestStars: |Mia Barron|Danielle Nicolet|Mike Starr|Jordan Gelber|Wass Stevens|Vanessa Aspillaga|Misha Kuznetsov|Tibor Feldman|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson find themselves digging through the dark world of the mob to find a killer when they discover the body of a former assassin. Meanwhile, Watson helps a close friend track down a mystery man who swept her off her feet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Talia Balsam|Sarah Wynter|Ted King|Kathleen Chalfant|Peter Hermann|Armando Riesco|
Episode.Overview: When Captain Gregson’s home is invaded, Holmes and Watson work to find the masked gunman before he strikes again. Meanwhile, Gregson gives his team some insight into his private life.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rhys Ifans|Olivia d'Abo|Phyllis Somerville|Andrew Samonsky|Joe Forbrich|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock’s brother, Mycroft, arrives in New York and enlists Holmes and Watson to help solve a case involving his former fiancée. Meanwhile, Sherlock has a difficult time accepting Mycroft and Joan’s relationship.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rhys Ifans|William Sadler|Margaret Colin|Casey Biggs|Kieran Campion|Jordan Gelber|Mark Zeisler|Johanna Day|
Episode.Overview: When a beautiful young woman is murdered, Holmes and Watson investigate her ties to a billionaire CEO. Mycroft makes a case for Sherlock to move back to London.

Episode.GuestStars: |Troy Garity|Chris Bauer|Eric Sheffer Stevens|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson uncover the identity of a serial killer whose case has gone cold and find themselves butting heads with the NYPD.

Episode.GuestStars: |Elizabeth Marvel|Frankie Faison|Danny Mastrogiorgio|Jordan Lage|Zachary Booth|Brian Reddy|Angel Desai|Tom Day|Robert Turano|
Episode.Overview: When an investigation goes horribly wrong, Sherlock must testify in an official police inquiry which jeopardizes his and Watson’s future with the NYPD.

Episode.GuestStars: |Heather Burns|Ato Essandoh|Richard Masur|Peter Gerety|Stephen Tyrone Williams|Robert Creighton|Rebecca Dayan|Lucas Hall|Kristine Johnson|Thomas Ryan|
Episode.Overview: When a hedge fund manager who was also running a Ponzi scheme is murdered, Holmes and Watson must determine which of his clients is guilty. Also, Sherlock contemplates sponsoring a fellow recovering addict.

Episode.GuestStars: |Natalie Dormer|Faran Tahir|Andrew Howard|Delphina Belle|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson come face to face with Moriarty when their one-time adversary is brought in as a consultant on a kidnapping case. Meanwhile, Detective Bell continues his struggle on the road to recovery.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Gerety|Vincent Curatola|Tim Guinee|Danny McCarthy|Wendy Hoopes|Fulvio Cecere|Paul Sorvino|
Episode.Overview: When a body is found in a barrel, Holmes and Watson launch an investigation into the mafia’s ties to the murder. Meanwhile, Sherlock attempts to make amends with Detective Bell.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ashlie Atkinson|Stephen Tyrone Williams|James Martinez|Jonno Roberts|Jane Alexander|
Episode.Overview: When Joan revisits one of Sherlock’s cold cases, she discovers an unsolved murder is connected to a rare prehistoric fossil. Meanwhile, Sherlock finds himself in uncharted territory when his duties as a sobriety sponsor cross his personal boundaries.

Episode.GuestStars: |Aleksa Palladino|Scott Cohen|Bill Sage|David A. Gregory|Jennifer Laura Thompson|
Episode.Overview: Holmes’ latest investigation takes him inside a professional dance company when an up-and-coming ballerina is murdered. Meanwhile, Watson embarks on a solo enquiry to find a homeless veteran when his friend alleges he was abducted.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sean Pertwee|Bill Irwin|Maggie Lacey|Sarah Goldberg|Parker Pogue|Bhavesh Patel|Rosalyn Coleman|
Episode.Overview: Tensions rise when Holmes and Watson are forced to partner with Gareth Lestrade, Sherlock’s former Scotland Yard colleague, on a bombing investigation.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sean Pertwee|Jeremy Davidson|Cara Buono|Sean Nelson|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson consult on a case in which a man suspected of murdering his wife years ago receives a ransom demand for her safe return. Meanwhile, Lestrade overstays his welcome at the brownstone and seems unwilling to leave.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Hound of the Cancer Cells
Episode.GuestStars: |Mather Zickel|Ron Canada|Shiri Appleby|Gretchen Egolf|Jordan Gelber|Christina Jackson|Ralph Byers|
Episode.Overview: When a famous cancer researcher is found dead, Holmes and Watson must determine if the scientist’s untimely demise was tied to his latest cutting-edge invention. Meanwhile, Bell is finally cleared to re-enter the field.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Many Mouths of Aaron Colville
Episode.GuestStars: |Bruce Altman|Robert Stanton|Judith Ivey|Christopher Fitzgerald|
Episode.Overview: A serial killer known for biting his victims appears to be killing again, even though he was presumed dead.

Episode.GuestStars: |Garret Dillahunt|Roger Rees|Michael Medeiros|Jamie Harrold|Dennis Flanagan|
Episode.Overview: A pickpocket dies of anthrax poisoning, putting Holmes and Watson on the trail of the toxin’s source in order to prevent more deaths.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Man With the Twisted Lip
Episode.GuestStars: |Rhys Ifans|Jeremy Shamos|Henri Lubatti|T. Ryder Smith|Josh Salatin|Vincenzo Amato|Teal Wicks|Candis Cayne|Mandy Siegfried|
Episode.Overview: When Sherlock’s brother Mycroft makes a surprise return to New York, his motivations cause discord between Sherlock and Joan. Meanwhile, a missing person case takes Sherlock and Joan inside the world of unmanned aeronautics.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rhys Ifans|Michael Gaston|Henri Lubatti|Tim Guinee|Vincenzo Amato|Andrew Halliday|Ty Jones|
Episode.Overview: Business becomes personal for Sherlock when he is forced to partner with his estranged brother, Mycroft, to solve a case with life-or-death consequences.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rhys Ifans|Ralph Brown|Emily Bergl|Jim Norton|Jordan Gelber|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson come into contact with MI-6, the British intelligence agency, when a standard murder investigation turns out to have international and political implications. Meanwhile, in the wake of a crisis, Watson reevaluates her relationships with Sherlock and his brother, Mycroft.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rhys Ifans|Ralph Brown|Jim Norton|Nasser Faris|
Episode.Overview: Rising tension between Sherlock and Joan brings their partnership to a crossroads, but they endeavor to put their differences aside while they help Sherlock's brother, Mycroft, who faces accusations of treason and murder.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ophelia Lovibond|Raza Jaffrey|Brennan Brown|Kate Hodge|JoAnna Rhinehart|Anthony Arkin|Gina Gershon|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock returns to New York with a new apprentice and a renewed interest in working with the NYPD after being fired by London’s MI6. However, Gregson won’t let him resume consulting for the department without permission from his former partner, Joan, the NYPD’s new go-to private investigator.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sonya Walger|Ophelia Lovibond|Zak Orth|Chris McGarry|John Rothman|
Episode.Overview: When Sherlock and Joan join forces on a double homicide, Sherlock’s new apprentice threatens the investigation when she allows her jealousy of Sherlock and Joan's work rapport to override her better judgment.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rich Sommer|Ophelia Lovibond|Jacob Pitts|Raza Jaffrey|Audrey Lynn Weston|Phil Simms|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock helps a math genius from his network of 'Irregulars' experts after he stumbles upon a body while participating in a math puzzle competition. Joan attempts to extend an olive branch after she learns about Kitty’s past.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ophelia Lovibond|Michael Cristofer|Raza Jaffrey|Michael Chernus|Condola Rashad|Halley Feiffer|Robert Capron|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock takes on the case of a stolen artificial intelligence software program, but seeks out Joan when he'd rather disprove the computer's abilities than find the thief. Joan meets Sherlock head-on when she finds out he's met with Andrew without telling her.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ophelia Lovibond|Liza J. Bennett|Rafi Silver|Joe Grifasi|Daniel Abeles|Nadia Dajani|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Kitty investigate the murder of a postal store owner whose death is connected to the illegal diamond trade. Meanwhile, Gregson's career is placed in jeopardy when he hits a fellow NYPD officer.

Episode.GuestStars: |Mamie Gummer|Ophelia Lovibond|Skipp Sudduth|K. Todd Freeman|Eric Schweig|David Adkins|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson search for a thief who committed murder to steal a rare map. Meanwhile, Watson becomes concerned with Sherlock’s escalating interference into Kitty’s burgeoning personal life.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Adventure of the Nutmeg Concoction
Episode.GuestStars: |Ophelia Lovibond|Christian Camargo|Jon David Casey|Kate Arrington|Kevin Geer|Peter Benson|Candis Cayne|Tom Mardirosian|John Horton|Lewis Cleale|
Episode.Overview: A bored Sherlock forces his investigative services onto Joan, who is trying to locate a woman who has been missing for five years, and the only clue is the smell of nutmeg at the site of her disappearance. Meanwhile, Joan’s bond with her long-distance boyfriend, Andrew, is tested when a man from her past reappears and asks for her help.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ophelia Lovibond|Rebecca Brooksher|Gregory Abbey|Triney Sandoval|Andrew Dolan|Kerry Butler|Leslie Silva|Geoffrey Wigdor|Ken Marks|Rajesh Bose|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson join forces with the NYPD after a police officer is murdered. Also, Sherlock searches for the creator of a “recovery blog” who is posting personal statements he has made in sobriety meetings.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ophelia Lovibond|Lawrence Gilliard Jr.|Ato Essandoh|Jordan Gelber|Dakin Matthews|Luke Robertson|Robert Capron|Julienne Hanzelka Kim|Andrea Syglowski|Seiko Suzuki Shih|
Episode.Overview: When Watson joins forces with Holmes and Kitty to locate a missing nurse she used to work with, the woman’s trail leads them to another person who has recently disappeared.

Episode.GuestStars: |Katie Finneran|Ophelia Lovibond|Madison Riley|Zuzanna Szadkowski|Christopher Innvar|Olivia Nikkanen|Rachel Hilson|
Episode.Overview: While Kitty tries to find a runaway teen, Sherlock and Joan work a case in which the murder of a brilliant bioengineer looks to be at the hands of a drug cartel. Also, Joan makes a major life decision but worries it will impact Sherlock negatively, not knowing that Sherlock has big news of his own.

Episode.GuestStars: |Stuart Townsend|Ophelia Lovibond|Tammy Blanchard|Katrina Lenk|David Valcin|Robert Eli|Roe Hartrampf|
Episode.Overview: Watson begins her new job as an in-house investigator for an insurance firm. However, her attention shifts to a case that is personal for both her and Holmes when they join forces to eliminate an imminent threat to Kitty.

Episode.GuestStars: |Stuart Townsend|Ophelia Lovibond|Jessica Blank|Edward Baker-Duly|David Andrew Macdonald|
Episode.Overview: As Kitty begins to unravel due to the imminent threat to her safety, Sherlock and Joan intensify their efforts to help her. Also, the origin of Sherlock and Kitty’s relationship is revealed.

Episode.GuestStars: |Raza Jaffrey|Amy Hargreaves|Grace Rex|Jayne Houdyshell|Brian George|Jacinto Taras Riddick|Ben Livingston|Devika Bhise|
Episode.Overview: When a debt collector is murdered, Holmes and Watson try to narrow down the suspect pool from thousands of consumers who owed the victim money. Meanwhile, Watson’s relationship with Andrew progresses when he asks her to meet his father for the first time.

Episode.GuestStars: |Chandler Williams|Louis Cancelmi|Brian George|Gina Gershon|Anthony Gaskins|
Episode.Overview: An unexpected event brings Watson into contact again with Elana March, the crime boss she brought to justice. Also, with Watson distracted, Holmes partners with Detective Bell to investigate a theft at a local zoo.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alicia Witt|Maria Dizzia|Michael Cumpsty|Jason Pendergraft|Anastasia Barzee|Peter Jay Fernandez|Julia Murney|Moti Margolin|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson follow a blood trail into the world of wrongful death compensation when they investigate a series of murders in which the killer leaves envelopes of cash on the victims. Also, Holmes makes a generous gesture towards Watson as she suffers through the aftermath of a personal crisis.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael Weston|Gary Wilmes|Richard Brooks|Aaron Serotsky|Felix Solis|Lauren Vélez|Jessica Diaz|
Episode.Overview: When Holmes is implicated in the murder of a woman who was killed during the height of his addiction, he investigates himself to find their connection. As Holmes retraces his steps with Watson’s help, the clues make his confidence in his own character waver.

Episode.GuestStars: |Freda Foh Shen|Mark Margolis|Patrick Breen|Jordan Gelber|Tom Costello|Michael McCormick|Madeline Weinstein|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson investigate a murder that initially looks like a road rage incident, but takes a new direction when they learn the victim was flash-frozen at the time of death. Also, when Watson’s mother finds out Joan’s brother is cheating on his wife, she puts Joan in the awkward position of confronting him about the affair.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jeremy Cohenour|Julian Seredowych|Anastasia Griffith|Devin Ratray|Kate Jennings Grant|Andre Ward|Bill English|Zoe Winters|
Episode.Overview: When a driver for a ridesharing company is intentionally run over by a city cab, Holmes and Watson wonder if it’s a case of professional jealousy. A casual romance Holmes has with one of his longtime “Irregular” consultants becomes complicated when the woman makes a shocking request.

Episode.GuestStars: |Joseph Cross|Adam Chanler-Berat|Rosyln Ruff|Steve Routman|Lucy Owen|Will Pullen|Erik Heger|Gretchen Hall|Susan Pourfar|Alicia Harding|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson find themselves in the middle of a civil war being fought on the Internet when a member of Everyone, the anonymous hacker group they periodically work with, is murdered.

Episode.GuestStars: |Liza J. Bennett|Jordan Gelber|Eric Bogosian|Joseph Melendez|Anita Gillette|Andrew Rothenberg|Marcy Harriell|Robert Capron|Lohrasp Kansara|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson investigate the murder of a professional skeptic, a man who debunked paranormal, religious and scientific phenomena for a living. The case becomes urgent when his homicide reveals a potential threat to homeland security. Also, Captain Gregson’s daughter and fellow NYPD officer, Hannah, asks Watson for help with one of her cases.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ato Essandoh|Jordan Gelber|Fisher Stevens|Terry Serpico|Gene Farber|Natalie Gold|Michael McGlone|Sarah Bolt|Jillian Taylor|Kevin Morrow|Danny McCarthy|
Episode.Overview: When two New York City paramedics are killed during a kidnapping, Holmes and Watson join the manhunt to find the murderer and the woman he abducted. Also, Holmes learns important information about his recovery sponsor, Alfredo, that strains their relationship.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Best Way Out Is Always Through
Episode.GuestStars: |Susan Misner|Afton Williamson|Malcolm Xavier|Waymon Arnette|Glenn Fleshler|John Sanders|Michael Kostroff|Marianne Ferrari|
Episode.Overview: When a judge is murdered, Holmes and Watson become involved in the interstate search to find the prime suspect, an escaped convict from a privatized prison. Also, when Holmes applies his deductive reasoning to Detective Bell’s new relationship, the romance hits a rough patch.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sutton Foster|Patch Darragh|Tony Crane|Kevin O'Rourke|Arian Moayed|Paul Urcioli|Danny Boushebel|Tyler Lansing Weaks|Dorothy Lyman|Lisa Emery|Martin LaPlatney|Adam Sietz|David Michael Garry|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson look into the death of a member of Holmes’ online beekeeping community who was a researcher looking into a deadly Northeast honey bee outbreak. During the investigation, they meet Tara Parker, a brilliant entomologist, academic and the leader of New York’s beekeeping society. Also, Captain Gregson enlists Watson’s services in an off-book investigation that helps him make a life-changing decision.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ato Essandoh|Michael Weston|Jason Kolotouros|Brenda Pressley|Elia Monte-Brown|Patrick Page|Matthew Saldivar|Maceo Oliver|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson take on an investigation of a personal nature when Holmes’ recovery sponsor, Alfredo, suddenly disappears. As they delve into Alfredo’s life for clues, Holmes questions whether their friend has been abducted, or worse, if he suffered a relapse into addiction.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Zayas|Patrick Page|Tim Guinee|Gary Milner|Alia Attallah|Devika Bhise|Paul Calderon|Miriam Cruz|Flora Diaz|
Episode.Overview: When Holmes faces criminal charges in the aftermath of his recent violent behavior and relapse, his powerful father arrives in New York to fix his estranged son’s legal difficulties by any means necessary. Also, with Holmes and Watson’s consultancy with the NYPD in jeopardy, Holmes concentrates on the case of a missing wife believed to have been killed by her husband to try and get back in the department’s good graces.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jeremy Bobb|Sean Cullen|Marin Ireland|Geoffrey Cantor|Christian DeMarais|Lisa Ferreira|Rudy Mungaray|Wayne Chang|Ron Nakahar|Roya Shanks|Sarah Dacey Charles|
Episode.Overview: When Morland offers to use his influence to have Sherlock and Joan reinstated as consultants to the NYPD, Sherlock’s mistrust of his father makes him question his motivation to help. Also, with no work offers coming in, Watson wrangles a gig with the FBI investigating a triple homicide in a top secret research lab.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jordan Gelber|Drew Rausch|Jefferson White|Shohreh Aghdashloo|Alexander Salamat|Brendan Bradley|Stephen Bogardus|Deborah Offner|
Episode.Overview: When Sherlock finds himself distracted by his father’s ongoing presence in New York City, he offers to help Morland resolve a work issue in exchange for his prompt departure home. Also, Holmes and Watson’s investigation into the double murder of two men who looked alike leads them into the world of facial recognition technology.

Episode.EpisodeName: All My Exes Live in Essex
Episode.GuestStars: |Susan Pourfar|Gabriel Olds|Robert Manning Jr|Jenn Colella|Stephanie Janssen|Donald Sage Mackay|Gene Gillette|Carolyn McCormick|Monique Gabriela Curnen|Quincy Tyler Bernstine|Sanjit De Silva|Jacqueline Antaramian|John Ellison Conlee|Heidi Armbruster|
Episode.Overview: When Holmes and Watson investigate the murder of a fertility lab technician, they discover the woman had a secret personal life that leads them to multiple suspects. Also, the tables are turned on Watson when she’s investigated by an NYPD detective.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ato Essandoh|Jordan Gelber|Erin Fritch|Salvatore Inzerillo|Will Brill|Daniel Jenkins|Jon DeVries|Stacey Yen|Nick Wyman|Andrew Weems|
Episode.Overview: When an archeologist is murdered, Holmes and Watson believe the man may have been killed for what he discovered during his last excavation in a local landfill. Also, Sherlock’s relationship with Alfredo, his friend and former sobriety sponsor, hits a rough patch.

Episode.GuestStars: |Edoardo Ballerini|John Shea|Reed Diamond|Jakob Von Eichel|Michael Esper|Celia Keenan-Bolger|Joel Marsh Garland|Ted Koch|Andrew Breving|John Jellison|Will Cobbs|Jonathan Sale|
Episode.Overview: Morland offers to act as one of his son’s “Irregular” consultants so that he can lend Sherlock and Joan his considerable resources to help them solve a case.

Episode.GuestStars: |John Heard|Ally Ioannides|Raphael Sbarge|Kathryn Erbe|Kristine Nielsen|Sarah Cetrulo|Genson Blimline|J. Bernard Calloway|
Episode.Overview: When Watson’s stepfather writes a crime novel based on her work with Holmes without her knowledge, an underlying issue in their relationship is revealed. Also, as Holmes and Watson investigate a retired FBI agent’s murder, they discover the man’s death is connected to an unsolved case from the victim’s career.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jordan Gelber|Seamus Mulcahy|Noah Bean|Michael Pemberton|Eisa Davis|Andrew Guilarte|Michael O'Keefe|Megan Sikora|David Alan Basche|Nneka Okafor|Danielle Lee Greaves|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson investigate a homicide in which the victim was murdered in a manner reminiscent of the crimes of an infamous, and already incarcerated, serial killer. Also, Sherlock and Joan tutor Detective Bell for a police sergeant’s exam that would lead to a promotion and a post at another precinct.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robert Capron|Josh Cooke|Betty Gilpin|John Ventimiglia|Cindy Cheung|Olga Berezhnaya|Michelle Duffy|Tom Wopat|Alexander Sokovikov|Val Rich|Kirill Nikiforov|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson search for a computer hacker responsible for three murders, including the death of a Russian billionaire who was visiting New York City. Also, Joan is surprised to receive a solo dinner invitation from Sherlock’s father.

Episode.GuestStars: |Edoardo Ballerini|Tate Donovan|Tamara Tunie|Jack Gwaltney|Peter Albrink|Richard H. Blake|John Skelley|Ramon Fernandez|Zoë Sophia Garcia|Gabriella Baires|Sarah Hunt|Joshua Kobak|Shannan Wilson|
Episode.Overview: Holmes’ tentative reconciliation with his father suffers a setback when Holmes and Watson discover Morland has been keeping a secret that threatens all of their safety. Also, Holmes and Watson investigate two murders connected to a for-profit college and its illegal recruitment practices.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jordan Gelber|Monique Gabriela Curnen|John Finn|Philip Ettinger|Kate Burton|Alexander Cendese|Amy Rutberg|Angelina Impellizzeri|Robert Montano|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson must search for a killer without any physical evidence to aid them after a bomb is detonated in the New York City morgue. Also, Watson is suspicious when an NYPD detective she’s in a grudge match with asks her to consult on a case.

Episode.GuestStars: |Betty Gilpin|Marc Menchaca|Zabryna Guevara|Matt Servitto|Happy Anderson|Jonathan Louis Dent|
Episode.Overview: Captain Gregson’s colleague from Narcotics asks Holmes to orchestrate the perfect heist inside the heavily armed and virtually impenetrable compound of a drug-dealing biker gang. Also, when Watson assists Fiona Helbron, who helped her on a recent case, she makes a surprising discovery about Holmes.

Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Kind|Lee Aaron Rosen|Joe Mazzello|Sarita Choudhury|David Thornton|Manoel Felciano|Austin Durant|Henny Russell|Maryann Hu|Marcus Ho|Jacob Bitzer|Andreas Damm|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock and Joan search for a murderer who used poisonous mushrooms to kill a botany professor and a group of the instructor’s students. Also, when Joan is disturbed by loud noise next door, she discovers her neighbor, Trent, is renting out his home through a vacation site that caters to hard partiers.

Episode.GuestStars: |Elizabeth Sung|Eddie Korbich|Joe Mazzello|James Hong|Tzi Ma|Kevin Kilner|Charlotte Bydwell|
Episode.Overview: When Holmes’ investigation into the attempt on Morland’s life pushes their strained relationship to the breaking point, the identity of Sherlock’s mother is revealed. Also, when three gang members are murdered, Holmes and Watson are amazed when an elderly woman emerges as their prime suspect.

Episode.EpisodeName: Up to Heaven and Down to Hell
Episode.GuestStars: |Jordan Gelber|Virginia Madsen|Skipp Sudduth|Malcolm Gets|Brian Avers|Andy Taylor|Edelen McWilliams|Jackie Hoffman|Jon Shaver|Haddi Tabal|Rebecca S'manga Frank|Cullen Wheeler|
Episode.Overview: When Watson runs into Captain Gregson and his secret girlfriend, a former NYPD officer, she inadvertently sets the couple’s breakup in motion. Also, Holmes and Watson investigate the murder of a wealthy woman who left her considerable estate solely to a beloved dog.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jordan Gelber|Tom Everett Scott|Michael Gladis|Drew Gehling|Jennifer Ikeda|Haviland Morris|Enid Graham|Kevin Isola|Ric Stoneback|Robbie Tann|Adam Heller|Raymond Neil Hernandez|
Episode.Overview: At the urging of Morland’s wealthy associate, Henry Baskerville, Holmes and Watson look into the death of his brother and discover that a witness saw the man chased to his death by a large, glowing animal too fantastic to be real. Sherlock considers intervening when the trauma from the bombing at the morgue negatively impacts ME Hawes’ work.

Episode.EpisodeName: You've Got Me, Who's Got You?
Episode.GuestStars: |Daniel Reece|Michael Mosley|Richard Portnow|Robert Petkoff|Casey Predovic|Eric Anderson|Lisa Datz|Otto Sanchez|Al Sapienza|Stephen Singer|
Episode.Overview: When a vigilante dressed up as a comic book hero is murdered, Holmes and Watson need to find the man's true identity and find his killer. Also, Morland makes a surprise donation to Watson’s favorite charity, in order to compel her to do him a business-related favor.

Episode.GuestStars: |Betty Gilpin|Frederick Weller|Seth Gilliam|Daniel Oreskes|Auden Thornton|Miriam Shor|Max Von Essen|Nadia Dajani|Kate Miller|Wayne Maugens|Nathaniel Springer|
Episode.Overview: When a survivalist doctor goes missing, Holmes and Watson must determine whether he’s purposely gone off the grid or if he’s a victim of foul play. Also, Holmes exhibits odd behavior when his romantic relationship with Fiona hits a critical point.

Episode.GuestStars: |Samantha Quan|Sepideh Moafi|Tim Guinee|Kushtrim Hoxha|Jonathan Avigdori|Daniel London|Grainger Hines|Nadia Dajani|Stephen DeRosa|
Episode.Overview: A mysterious woman who organizes illegal, high-stakes poker games arrives on Holmes and Watson’s doorstep and tells them her life is in danger claiming to be a former associate of Mycroft, Sherlock’s brother. However, as the pair investigates, Joan becomes suspicious that their new client isn’t being truthful.

Episode.GuestStars: |Samantha Quan|Christina Cox|Jason Dirden|Evan Hall|Margo Siebert|Luna Velez|Quentin Mare|Tijuana Ricks|Lauren Culpepper|Andy Lucien|Victoria Janicki|Zanny Laird|
Episode.Overview: As Holmes and Watson investigate a woman’s murder, they discover her death is linked to a piece of artwork that has ties to a crime that was committed when she was in college. Also, in the wake of a shocking personal revelation, Watson attempts to forge a connection with a recent client.

Episode.EpisodeName: Ain't Nothing Like the Real Thing
Episode.GuestStars: |Jordan Gelber|Alexander Chaplin|Kathleen McNenny|April L. Hernandez|Robert Petkoff|Michael Eaddy|Tim Bohn|Ro Boddie|Andhy Méndez|Steve Rosen|Tommar Wilson|
Episode.Overview: When Holmes and Watson are pulled into a double-homicide investigation, they discover the victims were staging a fake murder right at the moment they were killed. Also, Watson’s inside man at Morland’s office encounters a problem that threatens to expose her spying to Holmes and his father.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cassie Beck|Robert Petkoff|Sue Jean Kim|Yul Vasquez|Joe Holt|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock’s father, Morland, becomes Sherlock and Joan’s prime suspect in a murder investigation after one of his employees is killed under the guise of a robbery.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tony Curran|John Procaccino|Pasha Lychnikoff|Anthony Mangano|Mary Bacon|
Episode.Overview: When Holmes and Watson discover the perpetrator behind the attempt made on Morland’s life, they find a shocking connection to themselves.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tony Curran|Jeremy Bobb|John Procaccino|Roma Chugani|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson’s lives are threatened by an influential, worldwide criminal network connected to the murder attempt on Morland Holmes. Also, Sherlock’s grievances with his father threaten their alliance to bring their mutual adversary to justice.

Episode.GuestStars: Nelsan Ellis|Lee Tergesen|Matthew Del Negro|Bianca Amato|Lorenzo Pisoni|Leopold Manswell|Jacob Alexander
Episode.Overview: When a serial bomber becomes active again after being dormant for six years, Watson seeks help from Shinwell Johnson, a former patient whose life she saved when she was a surgeon. Holmes senses Watson is unhappy and questions whether she is still fulfilled by her detective career.

Episode.GuestStars: Nelsan Ellis|Jon Huertas|Raymond Ma|Derek Goh|Francis Jue|Ron Rifkin|Shelley Thomas|Annie Q.|Stacey Sargeant|Jane Alexander|Pierre Jean Gonzalez|Ryan Andes|Michael Mulheren|Madai Chakell
Episode.Overview: When the leader of a local street gang abducts Holmes to compel him to find the person responsible for a hit on his men, Holmes and Watson get caught in the middle of an international hunt to recover a centuries old, priceless artifact. Watson debates whether a personal favor Shinwell asks of her is outside her comfort zone.

Episode.GuestStars: Virginia Madsen|Zachary Knighton|Kim Director|Curtiss Cook|Anthony De Sando|Gideon Glick|Tonye Patano|Victor Verhaeghe|Ryan Garbayo
Episode.Overview: Holmes learns a secret about Captain Gregson’s girlfriend when she hires him for a case she wants kept off of Gregson’s radar. Holmes and Watson join the NYPD’s search for an abducted woman.

Episode.EpisodeName: Henny Penny the Sky is Falling
Episode.GuestStars: Owain Yeoman|Rob McClure|Richard Thomas|Bridget Ann White|Gordon Clapp|Linda Powell|Myra Lucretia Taylor|Daniel Cosgrove|Suzy Jane Hunt|Maechi Aharanwa
Episode.Overview: Captain Gregson lobbies to include Holmes and Watson when his unit is selected to receive a city commendation for its exemplary work. As Holmes and Watson consult on the investigation into a financial analyst’s murder, they are drawn into the world of asteroid research.

Episode.GuestStars: Conor Leslie|Matthew Rauch|Frank Whaley|Philip Casnoff|Kia Goodwin|Alfredo Narciso|Dorian Missick|Mark Tallman|Jill Paice|Deidre Goodwin|Arnold Y. Kim
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson have plenty of suspects when they investigate the murder of a man who led a secret life as a vigilante, “catfishing” sexual predators on dating sites and publicly shaming them. When Shinwell’s criminal record prevents him from finding a full-time job, Holmes disagrees with Watson’s plan to help him.

Episode.GuestStars: Jordan Gelber|Betty Gilpin|Chasten Harmon|Elizabeth Ward Land|David Aaron Baker|Holly Chou|Julian Acosta|Stephen Chacon|Graham Rowat|Yassmin Alers|Katie Kreisler|Sendhil Ramamurthy|Tyrone Mitchell Henderson
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson investigate a mass murder when a chef and his patrons are poisoned with snake venom. Detective Bell’s crush on a work colleague makes Holmes realize his and Fiona’s relationship is at an important crossroads.

Episode.GuestStars: Samantha Quan|Laura Heisler|Anna Khaja|Ishmail Bashey|Quincy Dunn-Baker|Dan Ziskie|Eddie McGee|Flor De Liz Perez|Todd Lawson|Bill Dawes|Ruffin Prentiss|Sam Breslin Wright|Pia Haddad|Mohit Guatam
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson search for two murderers after a base jumper is shot out of the sky by one killer, and has his parachute sabotaged by another. After Joan’s sister, Lin, thinks she sees Shinwell with a member of his old gang, Joan takes drastic measures to make sure he won’t be drawn back into a life of crime.

Episode.GuestStars: Jonathan Freeman|Jordan Gelber|Haynes Thigpen|Rosa Gilmore|Jeff McCarthy|Fran Kranz|Ito Aghayere|Rosie Benton|Mitch Greenberg|Ebrahim Jaffer|Patricia R. Floyd
Episode.Overview: Joan worries Sherlock’s sobriety is at risk when she learns he has been lying to her about attending recovery meetings. Sherlock and Joan discover a man’s death caused by ingesting poisoned sausage is connected to a lab working on a breakthrough in the artificial meat industry.

Episode.EpisodeName: It Serves You Right to Suffer
Episode.GuestStars: Debi Mazar|Dorian Missick|Susan Blommaert|Jeremy Burnett|Ruffin Prentiss
Episode.Overview: When Shinwell comes to Holmes and Watson for help after he’s framed for a gang killing, they have three days to find the real murderer before he is arrested and sent back to jail.

Episode.GuestStars: Chris McKinney|Emily Dorsch|Jake Brinskele|William Ragsdale|Darlesia Cearcy|Charlie Pollock|Stephanie Jean Lane|Wendell B. Franklin|Jeremy Burnett
Episode.Overview: When Watson is implicated in a DEA investigation into doctors writing illegal prescriptions, she and Holmes search for the person using her medical license to sell drugs.

Episode.GuestStars: Wade Williams|Deirdre Lovejoy|Luna Tieu|Tina Chilip|Ka-Ling Cheung|Jaime Lincoln Smith|John Bolton|Burke Moses|Samuel Gomez|Ruthie Ann Miles|Kristen Adele|Jessica Savage|DeShawn Harold Mitchell|Jeff Kready
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson race to find a woman who’s been held captive for years before the kidnapper takes drastic steps to avoid being caught. Watson becomes frustrated when Shinwell refuses to focus on his informant training with her and Holmes.

Episode.GuestStars: Barry Shabaka Henley|Damian Young|Chasten Harmon|Brian Muller|Robert Christopher Riley|Peter Onorati|Lee Sellars|Opal Alladin|Debra Jo Rupp
Episode.Overview: When Holmes and Watson investigate a clown’s murder upstate, they discover a connection between his death and the creation of a new weaponized virus. Watson helps Bell when he’s targeted by his new love interest Chantal’s ex-husband in attempt to sabotage her career at the district attorney’s office.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robert Capron|Isiah Whitlock, Jr.|Shuler Hensley|Teddy Canez|Rodney Richardson|Jason Bowen|Tony Roach|John Rue|Robert Cuccioli|Steven Taylor|Andrea Frierson|Joaquin Maceo Rosa|Marcella Lowery|Raphael Nash Thompson|Sandy Rosenberg|Jean Brassard|
Episode.Overview: A man takes hostages, including Joan, and threatens to execute them unless Holmes finds the person responsible for the death of his son. As Sherlock investigates, the captor gives him 16 hours to find the perpetrator before the statute of limitations on the crime runs out.

Episode.GuestStars: |Madai Chakell|James Kyson|Christine Taylor|Brian Hutchison|Bobby Moreno|Delia Cunningham|Catherine Blades|Andrew Manning|Alisa Ermolaev|Kathy Najimy|Rachel York|Kelly McAndrew|Connor Johnston|Olesya Senchenko|Hendrick Pilar|Arturo Sanchez|Jordan “JKap” Kaplan|Tarik Celik|Ryan Coker-Welch|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson investigate the murder of a former professional eSports video game player during a live video stream. Shinwell approaches Joan for advice when his teenage daughter asks to meet with him for the first time in years.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ophelia Lovibond|Blair Brown|Regina Taylor|Michael Patrick Thornton|Marianne Muellerleile|Scott Shepherd|
Episode.Overview: Holmes' former protégé, Kitty Winter, returns to New York after a three-year absence to warn him that a killer is eliminating everybody involved with a case they worked on together in London. Watson discovers that Kitty has a life-changing secret.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alan Rosenberg|Ophelia Lovibond|Blair Brown|Tim Guinee|Marianne Muellerleile|Scott Shepherd|
Episode.Overview: In the conclusion, Joan and Kitty try to prove that a string of murders, stemming from an old case Sherlock and Kitty solved in London, is connected to an international government conspiracy with the Defense Intelligence Agency at its center. Sherlock and Kitty’s relationship is strained after she shares life-changing news.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jòhn Doman|Michele Hicks|Henry Zebrowski|Chris McKinney|Julian Elijah Martinez|Iris Bahr|Tommy Schrider|Chelsea Spack|Diane Davis|Meat Loaf Aday|Mark Boone Junior|Danny Wolohan|Justin Adams|Kathryn Allison|
Episode.Overview: The police call in Holmes and Watson to consult on a homicide "heard" by a cutting edge gunshot detection system. Sherlock and Joan become suspicious of Shinwell when he's the target of a drive-by shooting that reveals a connection between him and an unsolved murder.

Episode.GuestStars: |Patrick Fabian|Nadia Alexander|Robert Capron|Julian Elijah Martinez|Danny Johnson|Jessica Phillips|Chris McKinney|Alejandro Hernandez|Tracy Howe|Naren Weiss|
Episode.Overview: Sherlock and Joan question how well they know Shinwell when they investigate the possibility he may have gotten away with the unsolved murder of his friend, a fellow gang member. Sherlock and Joan’s latest case puts them on the hunt for a treasure map rumored to lead to a fortune in pirate’s gold hidden around New York City.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jordan Gelber|Dan Lauria|David Corenswet|Rebecca Luker|Paul O'Brien|Carson Elrod|Ben Biggers|Zainab Jah|Marcus Choi|Charlbie Dean|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson investigate the murder of a man Sherlock considered one of New York’s worst private investigators. Also, as Holmes stews over being beaten by Shinwell, he decides to take out his aggression by dismantling a local organization of private investigators.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Art of Sleights and Deception
Episode.GuestStars: |Jason Butler Harner|Chasten Harmon|Robert Christopher Riley|Maury Ginsberg|Joey Sorge|Matthew Lawler|Leslie Fray|James Joseph O'Neil|Rachel Wenitsky|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson get mixed up in murder and magic when they investigate the death of a magician killed while performing a classic stunt. Also, Watson suspects Bell is being targeted by the ex-husband of his girlfriend, Chantal, after a false allegation lands him the middle of an Internal Affairs investigation.

Episode.EpisodeName: Fly Into a Rage, Make a Bad Landing
Episode.GuestStars: |Danny Burstein|Chasten Harmon|Robert Christopher Riley|Olek Krupa|Kelly Deadmon|Delaney Williams|Michael Berresse|Marnie Schulenburg|
Episode.Overview: When Detective Bell’s girlfriend, Chantal, is assaulted and her ex-husband is killed soon after, in what Holmes and Watson discover is a staged suicide, they search for one suspect behind the linked crimes. Also, as Bell fights the urge to seek his own brand of justice for Chantal, Sherlock makes a heartbreaking realization about the detective’s past.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tomiwa Edun|Mark Deklin|Karen Pittman|James Chen|LeRoy McClain|Chalia La Tour|Mark Lotito|
Episode.Overview: When a reality show contestant is murdered, Holmes and Watson zero in on another competitor as a suspect, a former war criminal who may be the most skilled killer they’ve ever pursued. Also, for the first time since he attacked Sherlock, Shinwell reaches out to Joan to ask for a favor.

Episode.GuestStars: |Stephen Rider|Al Thompson|Joanna Christie|Chris McKinney|Ruffin Prentiss|Clark Jackson|Daryl Edwards|Toni Ann DeNoble|Adrian Alvarado|Lilli Cooper|Megan Byrne|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson investigate a murder that puts them in the crosshairs of one of New York City’s deadliest gangs. Also, Holmes’ behavior becomes increasingly erratic when he secretly interacts with a mysterious woman.

Episode.GuestStars: |Joanna Christie|Stephen Rider|Jon Huertas|Melonie Diaz|Miguel Perez|Donald Paul|Clark Jackson|Stephen Rowe|
Episode.Overview: Holmes and Watson pursue an elusive criminal as a gang war erupts in New York City. While the NYPD works to contain the violence, the two investigate the murder that appears to have ignited the city-wide conflict, and discover that a familiar face is pulling the strings.

Episode.EpisodeName: An Infinite Capacity for Taking Pains
